review_text: I’m in my late 40s now and have been dealing with sleep disturbances. After starting this supplement, my sleep quality has greatly improved. I am not waking up as much and am able to go back to sleep afterwards if I do wake up. I am also feeling much more rested in the morning than I was previously

review_title: Love this stuff! Been using for several years
review_text:
I use melatonin as well but instead of upping my dose ( 1.5 gm) I use one of these. I use 2 when I want to be free of melatonin for a couple of days.
I have taken teas with some of these ingredients but of course drinking herbal tea just before you go to bed is going to guarantee a wake up in the middle of the night. So this method is much better

I've been using Natural Factors' 3 Brains, The Best-Sleep, for a couple of weeks now, and it's been a game-changer for my sleep quality. The blend of melatonin, 5-HTP, L-theanine, and herbal extracts like valerian and passionflower has made it much easier for me to fall asleep and stay asleep through the night. I particularly like that these are vegetarian capsules, aligning with my dietary preferences.

One of the biggest improvements I've noticed is waking up feeling more refreshed and less groggy compared to other sleep aids I've tried. There were a few nights where I experienced vivid dreams, but they weren't unpleasant, just more intense than usual. It's also worth mentioning that I didn't have any digestive issues, which can sometimes be a problem with supplements.

Overall, 3 Brains, The Best-Sleep, has significantly improved my sleep patterns and overall sense of well-being. If you're looking for a natural way to enhance your sleep, I would definitely recommend giving this product a try.

When pain affects my ability to sleep, I take this product. I use another product more often but this is my middle of the night waking up in pain product. Works very well and does not contain hops which gives me a runny nose. I recommend trying this product if sleep is a problem for you.

This seems to be a great quality dietary supplement which supports relaxation and promotes restful sleep.  The composition might benefit by leading to a  restful sleep.

The ingredients include: Passionflower & California poppy, Linden, Skullcap, and Hawthorn.

review_title: Ok, but doesn't keep me asleep any longer
review_text: This might be unfair, as I am going through menopause, and have been a chronic insomniac for years now, but I was so hopeful that this formula might help me. Sadly, in my own case, it doesn't seem to do more than the valerian & Bonine travel sickness tablet I take every night. Believe me, I wish melatonin worked for me, but I can't take sleep formulas with it, so I was really looking for any improvement with this, as it has no melatonin. Maybe, if you are just having occasional trouble, this will help you. I guess I'm writing this to any others out there in a similar situation, don't get your hopes up too high, and good luck!

I have paradoxical reactions to typical sleep supplements like melatonin, tryptophan, glycine etc so must avoid.  Thankfully The Best Sleep doesn't contain any of those kind of ingredients and yet is quite effective.  Finally, after decades of not sleeping, I am getting more Zzzz's and better quality sleep.  Haven't run into dependency nor has the supplement lost much efficacy after taking almost nightly for weeks on end.   Will update review later if anything changes for better or worse.

I'm a hard-core insomnia case. This is not the magic pill but it works better than many other herbal medicines I have tried. I have had a few good nights taking it. And it's fairly affordable. No unwanted side effects that I've noticed.

Edited part: It is very helpful and I will definitely keep using it. 
Original version: I have not tried it long enough, but so far it seems to help me relax and fall asleep. I am taking only one instead of the recommended two, because I am combining it with another natural sleep supplement with different ingredients and both together seem to be quite effective. The size is good, small enough, and there is no annoying smell or after taste.

I suppose it is a good blend for somebody, who does not wake up at night, but for me it is not strong enough to go back to sleep. I have to add melatonin to it. I decided to try it because I did not want to take melatonin. Now I add one mg of melatonin and this combination works better for me. Still looking for an ideal sleep aid!

review_title: No results towards sleeping. Mildly relaxing.
review_text:
This product didn't serve it's purpose for me, particularly. In terms to herbal ingredients for helping sleep time, such as poppy seed or passiflora I had better results with tinctures, teas, or processed pills. This one is dry extract pressed in a capsule, direct from the plants such as show in photo. It's big capsule, great dosage, but I doesn't delivers it's benefits such as it should. If taken during the day, you might feel relaxed to help with stressing days, but not sleepy as it is advertised.
Wouldn't buy it again. Passion fruit juice or passiflora tea itself has these effect on me. Found out that melatonin was the way to heal my wake-sleep cycle, minor dosages, less ingredients, makes your next day bright minded and stress-free if your mood helps.
Herbal extracts should be taken carefully, and only if an SOS situation, since they can cause liver saturation.
Hope my comment can direct your purchase!

review_title: What you need to improve the quality of sleep
review_text: There are problems with sleep due to overexcitability, you go to bed and cannot sleep for an hour, or even more. I used to drink melatonin, but it was taken off the market. I tried this collection of herbs, it helps to sleep better and the quality of sleep has become higher.

A sensitive stomach may not like it if you drink at night, in the morning there are small but pains. I found my own way: I drink after a hearty lunch at about 13:00, while it works, it's already 18:00, I manage to go to bed on time. They did not cause sleepiness during the day, rather they equalize the emotional background, in a peaceful state it is easier to go to bed. The capsules exactly increase the depth of sleep, they saved me from waking up at night! No sleepiness in the morning. I came to the conclusion that they do not have a hypnotic effect, but they improve the quality of sleep and balance emotions during the day. I buy it for the second time.

Due to stress, I was very tormented by insomnia. Woke up often at night, could not fall asleep again. This drug helped me a lot from the first day of taking it, I sleep all night. If there is an effect, then it is very soft and I did not feel it. But sleep is not getting worse after taking this drug. I would like to supplement my review. I'm not taking it for myself, for my mother. He sleeps badly, the person is already aged. There is definitely an effect. This is not the first time we use it, thanks for a good product.

I re-read many of those offered on this resource, but decided to stop at an inexpensive herbal preparation. Bribed that the vegan drug, with a shelf life until August 2023. The capsules are easy to drink, I did not feel any heaviness on the liver and there was no heart palpitations, for me these are important criteria. when taking herbal preparations. In my case, the positive sedative effect appeared on the fourth day of admission. I will say right away that when buying a drug with an herbal composition, I understood that the effect would be cumulative, and if on the first day of admission a strong sedative effect manifested itself, I would understand that something is wrong with this drug, but now - I am very pleased! You need to take a course and not drink alcohol. I plan, now and in the future, to use this drug in courses until I change jobs, where you do not need to spend nerves and forces)) If my review was useful to you, please click "Yes"!

I have been taking these capsules for a month, every day. Before them, she took melatonin and valerian, melatonin completely solved the problem with falling asleep, valerian solved (with prolonged use) the problem with evening sedation (which ultimately influenced the speed of falling asleep). These capsules do not act very quickly and you must not miss the moment when the dream crept up. If you have a gadget in your hands (and I always read before bedtime), then the onset of drowsiness may not come at all. At first it seemed to me that they did not work at all, but then I noticed that after 40-50 minutes after taking the capsule, drowsiness still occurs, but it is so soft and barely noticeable (when compared with the effect of melatonin) that you can not notice it. unless specifically tracked. The state of drowsiness lasts for a very short time and if this moment is missed, then drowsiness recedes and problems with falling asleep begin again. If you wait for it and carefully monitor it, and then immediately take advantage of this moment, then they (capsules) really help to fall asleep. That is, these capsules need an approach and some dexterity ... I did not have such problems with melatonin - if I did not fall asleep when drowsiness set in, it (drowsiness) still continued to overpower me (did not retreat) until I did not give up ... With these capsules this will not happen. Nevertheless, she didn’t downgrade the assessment, because they are very soft, but they work - not a dummy. But I would like a more effective remedy (or another dosage). And yes, after taking two capsules at the same time (per day) - nothing changed, their effect is still the same soft, unobtrusive and not always noticeable. It is easy to wake up after them, the sleep has become better (in quality), it resembles natural. Melatonin was hard in the morning - irritability tormented me and I had to drink something to keep you awake (vitamin C and the like). But with these capsules in the morning there is no need to drink invigorating substances, even if you have not had enough sleep for a couple of hours. And yes, it is better not to use gadgets before going to bed, then even more pronounced drowsiness sets in and it is easy to notice and use it. Because you don't have to be distracted by reading or watching something on the Internet. Unfortunately, I do not always succeed in this, so I will still look for another means of falling asleep. I tried to make this review useful to you. I would be grateful if you say "thank you".
Tends to sleep in half an hour after taking 2 capsules (usually it's hard for me to fall asleep). True, in the morning I do not feel very cheerful, so for me this drug is for 4k.

I have problems with deep sleep due to torn nerves, I sleep very lightly and if I wake up, I will not sleep anymore. I bought these pills to replace "sleep" from Now Foods. they were not on sale and I will compare with them. Here are my subjective impressions and my experience (I have been taking these capsules for 2 weeks). They are stronger than "Sleep", they smell nice with something mint. You have a drink and after about 30 minutes it starts to get sleepy. It is at this moment that you have to go to bed! There is no need to sit out and wait for the further effect. If you missed the "sleepy" wave, then it will disappear further and fall asleep yourself as it is. You can take up to 2 tablets at a time (depending on your sleep problems) - the first time I drank 2 tablets, I slept like a dead woman without dreams, but until the evening I caught helicopters and sooooo wanted to sleep. The next 3-4 days I took 1 capsule, the effect was the same as that of "Sleep" from 2 tablets (ie more or less average sleep, in the morning if I wake up I can go back to sleep). After 4 days, I switched back to 2 tablets and did not catch helicopters anymore: D What I like about them, unlike "Sleep", is that even if I slept for 5-6 hours due to overwork, then there is no drowsiness and there is some kind of strength to do something and, in principle, you are a capable person. Apparently they have a cumulative effect and in the first days it does not work as well as it can. I will take it further, see how these capsules will manifest themselves after a month of use and further.
